metadata.synopsis: A reaction to a dead avatar moving an item/touching them.

0.speaker: Halsin
0.text: Something is amiss. I feel an odd presence on the air. Familiar, yet... different.
0.context: NodeContext: Mildly spooked. A ghostly player is moving things around/touching him

1.speaker: Halsin
1.text: What was that? Are my senses betraying me...?
1.context: NodeContext: Mildly spooked. A ghostly player is moving things around/touching him
